# AudioVariant.spatialAudio

**Case**

Spatial audio is a fallback mode if the content is Dolby Atmos or Dolby Audio, but hardware capabilities don’t support them.

## Declaration

```swift
case spatialAudio
```
title: AudioVariant.spatialAudio
